headline: PepsiCo’s (PEP) Resilience Amid Challenges and Strong Dividends Continue to Attract Investors
summary: We recently published a list of 8 Best Beverage Dividend Stocks To Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) stands against best beverage stocks that pay dividends. Retail sales rebounded significantly in October as the economy remained stable and consumers overcame worries […]

headline: PepsiCo Agrees to Buy the Remaining 50% Stake in Sabra and Obela
summary: PEP agrees to fully acquire Sabra and Obela. The company is focused on boosting greater efficiency by reducing costs.

headline: Big Food’s RFK Selloff Looks Overdone, but the Industry Has Other Problems Too
summary: The prospect that a Health and Human Services Department led by  Robert F. Kennedy Jr.  could crack down on things like sugar and artificial additives appears to be driving much of the decline.  A loose definition could hit virtually everything packaged-food companies sell, from pasta sauce to plain Cheerios.
